title: wine_Brian_Carter_Cellars_2008_Solesce_Red_(Yakima_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 95203.
country: US.
description: This Bordeaux-style blend is 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, with the balance a mix of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Malbec. It's a sophisticated blend that retains its youthful freshness. Deep flavors run from black cherry through cassis, adding streaks of licorice, baking chocolate and a hint of bark and herb. Supple, graceful and polished, this wine would seem to have another decade of life ahead..
designation: Solesce.
points: 91.
price: 50.0.
province: Washington.
